content.text: How to create an online resume
An online resume is a digital version of a resume.
content.html: An online resume is a digital version of a resume.

content.text: It is an overview of your experience, skills, education, and achievements.
content.html: It is an overview of your experience, skills, education, and achievements.

content.text: It can be used to apply for a job, freelancer gig, consultancy engagement, or apply to a school.
content.html: It can be used to apply for a job, freelancer gig, consultancy engagement, or apply to a school.

content.text: The value of having it online as a website is that people from all over the world can access it easily.
content.html: The value of having it online as a website is that people from all over the world can access it easily.

content.text: What is a resume
The resume is an overview of your experience, competence, and skills.
content.html: The resume is an overview of your experience, competence, and skills.

content.text: It is most known for being a document, used to apply for jobs.
content.html: It is most known for being a document, used to apply for jobs.

content.text: Companies and hiring managers use the resume to get an understanding of who you are as a professional and what you are capable of doing.
content.html: Companies and hiring managers use the resume to get an understanding of who you are as a professional and what you are capable of doing.

content.text: Your online resume can be shared by its link to companies, hiring managers, and recruiters, so that they can notice you.
content.html: Your online resume can be shared by its link to companies, hiring managers, and recruiters, so that they can notice you.

content.text: Why create an online resume
A resume is relevant for every professional.
content.html: A resume is relevant for every professional.

content.text: Your resume as a website makes it easy for others to access and view your resume.
content.html: Your resume as a website makes it easy for others to access and view your resume.

content.text: It can be used to E.G. get a job, freelancing gig, consultancy engagement, or apply to a school.
content.html: It can be used to E.G. get a job, freelancing gig, consultancy engagement, or apply to a school.

content.text: Having it online makes it possible for people from all over the world to find you.
content.html: Having it online makes it possible for people from all over the world to find you.

content.text: The design of the resume gives the reader an impression of who you are. Make sure that it appears in a good and presentable way!
content.html: The design of the resume gives the reader an impression of who you are. Make sure that it appears in a good and presentable way!

content.text: What do I need to know to create my resume as a website?
HTML, CSS and JavaScript are the basic languages to create a website.
content.html: HTML, CSS and JavaScript are the basic languages to create a website.

content.text: You can come a long way just using these three!
content.html: You can come a long way just using these three!

content.text: How to create a resume step-by-step
Follow the steps to create your online resume from the ground up.
content.html: Follow the steps to create your online resume from the ground up.

content.text: Preparations
Decide which code editor to use and set up your environment.
content.html: Decide which code editor to use and set up your environment.

content.text: W3Schools has created an easy to use code editor called W3Schools Spaces . Sign up and get started in a few clicks.
content.html: W3Schools has created an easy to use code editor called W3Schools Spaces. Sign up and get started in a few clicks.

content.text: Create your index.html file. So that you are ready to enter the code.
content.html: Create your index.html file. So that you are ready to enter the code.

content.text: All set up. Lets go!
content.html: All set up. Lets go!

content.text: Step One: Add a Website Layout
Create a responsive website from scratch.
content.html: Create a responsive website from scratch.

links.text: How to create a Website Layout

content.text: Read here for how to create a website layout: How to create a Website Layout
content.html: Read here for how to create a website layout: How to create a Website Layout

content.text: A resume can be created in different ways.
content.html: A resume can be created in different ways.

content.text: There is not a one-size fits all .
content.html: There is not a one-size fits all.

content.text: Keep in mind why, how, and what , you are building it for.
content.html: Keep in mind why, how, and what, you are building it for.

content.text: Build the resume that is right for you.
content.html: Build the resume that is right for you.

content.text: Step Two: Plan your content
Think about how you want to design your resume.
content.html: Think about how you want to design your resume.

content.text: Step Three: Add content
Include the essential sections:
content.html: Include the essential sections:

content.text: Check out our How To library for more code snippets: How To Library
content.html: Check out our How To library for more code snippets: How To Library

content.text: 1. Contact Information section.
content.html: 1. Contact Information section.

content.text: Add your name and contact information.
content.html: Add your name and contact information.

content.text: The contact information section lets the reader know how to get in touch with you.
content.html: The contact information section lets the reader know how to get in touch with you.

content.text: 2. Key Summary section.
content.html: 2. Key Summary section.

content.text: Write a short summary that highlights your experience, competence, and skills.
content.html: Write a short summary that highlights your experience, competence, and skills.

content.text: Personalizing the text can make you stand out.
content.html: Personalizing the text can make you stand out.

content.text: The key summary helps the reader to get an understanding of who you are as a professional.
content.html: The key summary helps the reader to get an understanding of who you are as a professional.

content.text: Keep it short and simple.
content.html: Keep it short and simple.

content.text: 3. Education section.
content.html: 3. Education section.

content.text: Give an overview of your educational background.
content.html: Give an overview of your educational background.

content.text: Include details such as the institution, degree, and year.
content.html: Include details such as the institution, degree, and year.

content.text: Professional courses and certifications can also be listed as education.
content.html: Professional courses and certifications can also be listed as education.

content.text: 4. Work Experience section.
content.html: 4. Work Experience section.

content.text: List the jobs that you have had.
content.html: List the jobs that you have had.

content.text: Add details to each job, which includes what year, your role, and your responsibilities.
content.html: Add details to each job, which includes what year, your role, and your responsibilities.

content.text: Other experiences such as projects and freelancing gigs can also be a part of this list.
content.html: Other experiences such as projects and freelancing gigs can also be a part of this list.

content.text: CV example
We have made you a template that you can use and build with.
content.html: We have made you a template that you can use and build with.

content.text: You can load the CV template in W3Schools Spaces . Get started with publishing your online resume in a few clicks.
content.html: You can load the CV template in W3Schools Spaces. Get started with publishing your online resume in a few clicks.

content.text: * no credit card required
content.html: * no credit card required
